decks.notes: This deck focuses on using control elements to manipulate the game state and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key card, The One Ring, allows the player to gain control of the game as it accumulates power throughout the match. By combining powerful planeswalkers like Teferi and Narset with removal spells like Solitude and Prismatic Ending, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent until it can establish an overwhelming advantage and secure victory. Additionally, the inclusion of Leyline Binding and Subtlety further enhances the deck's ability to control the board and dictate the pace of the game.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to bring out powerful threats like Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. It utilizes the synergy between Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands to generate extra mana and take advantage of multiple land drops per turn. The goal is to set up a powerful board state with access to various utility lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Boseiju, Who Endures, while also being able to tutor for key pieces using Expedition Map and Tolaria West. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with explosive plays and combo potential.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy through discard spells like Thoughtseize and Grief, removal spells like Fatal Push and Sheoldred's Edict, and powerful creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also utilizes Liliana of the Veil for additional disruption and card advantage. The inclusion of cards like March of Wretched Sorrow and The One Ring provide ways to close out the game once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The mana base includes utility lands like Castle Locthwain and Field of Ruin to help control the battlefield.

This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creature tools to create powerful synergies and combos to overwhelm the opponent. It uses cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Grist, the Hunger Tide to generate value and control the board, while also utilizing creature toolbox cards like Chord of Calling to search for specific creatures. The deck incorporates a mix of efficient creatures and combo pieces, along with some disruption elements like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Endurance to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful companion Jegantha, the Wellspring to support a fast and aggressive playstyle. By including cards like Scion of Draco, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and other efficient creatures, the goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with early threats and finish the game before they can stabilize. With a mix of versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames, along with Leylines to protect the board, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game.

This Aggro deck focuses on using efficient spells and creatures to apply pressure to the opponent quickly. The deck includes disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Counterspell to control the game, along with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco to deal damage fast. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support for the aggressive strategy. The deck also includes a selection of lands to support its multicolored mana base, allowing for consistent and powerful plays throughout the game.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a board of creatures with +1/+1 counters using Hardened Scales and other support cards. The key strategy is to use Arcbound Ravager and Walking Ballista to distribute counters efficiently, while utilizing Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp and Patchwork Automaton to further enhance the power of the team. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and The Ozolith ensure that counters are never wasted, while Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings help to find key pieces of the combo. Inkmoth Nexus provides an alternate win condition with infect damage.

The deck focuses on cycling through cards to control the board and set up for a powerful combo with Living End. By cycling through cards like Striped Riverwinder and Street Wraith, the player can fill their graveyard with creatures to be brought back with Living End, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Curator of Mysteries and Generous Ent. The inclusion of Teferi, Time Raveler allows for additional control and protection, while Boseiju, Who Endures provides a powerful tool against counter spells. This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of disruption and powerful creatures brought back from the graveyard.

The main idea of this deck is to maximize the efficiency of land-based ramp and synergy with Amulet of Vigor to quickly assemble the mana base needed to cast Primeval Titan. The deck aims to utilize Primeval Titan's search ability to find utility lands like The One Ring, Sol Ring, and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. By generating a large amount of mana and landing multiple Titans in a short amount of time, the deck can overwhelm opponents with powerful land-based combos and threats.

This deck revolves around using Indomitable Creativity to combo off with Leyline Binding, creating a powerful board state with Archon of Cruelty and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The deck also utilizes counter spells like Delay and Spell Pierce to protect its combo pieces, along with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Prismatic Ending. Wrenn and Six provide card advantage and recursion, while Teferi, Time Raveler disrupts the opponent's game plan. The mana base includes fetchlands and triomes to ensure consistent mana access for the deck's powerful plays.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Indomitable Creativity in combination with Leyline Binding to quickly and efficiently bring out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty. Other key cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Wrenn and Six provide additional support and value. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler and Lightning Bolt to control the board and protect the combo. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the combo pieces and ensure consistency in executing the game plan. Overall, the deck aims to achieve a unique and powerful win condition through creativity and synergy.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive goblins. It utilizes cards that provide efficient creature generation and removal, as well as ways to maximize their damage output. The deck also includes key cards for card advantage and consistency. The mana base is optimized to support the goblin tribal theme and ensure smooth gameplay. The goal is to relentlessly attack the opponent, building up a strong board presence and finishing them off before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using cards like Overgrowth and Utopia Sprawl to cast powerful spells early on. It also utilizes control elements like Karn, the Great Creator and Garruk Wildspeaker to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The win condition comes from casting Tooth and Nail to search for combo pieces like The One Ring and Delighted Halfling to close out the game. The deck aims to dominate the board through mana ramp, control spells, and powerful creatures, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with its efficient gameplay.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and efficient spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing powerful threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with Counterspells and Force of Negation, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game. The inclusion of Leyline spells and Leyline Binding helps to ensure a consistent mana base and powerful plays, while also enabling explosive turns. Overall, the deck aims to win quickly and decisively through aggressive plays and efficient resource management.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler. The deck is built around generating card advantage and keeping the opponent on their back foot, while also using the companion Kaheera, the Orphanguard for additional utility. The inclusion of powerful multicolor cards like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Leyline Binding allows for flexibility in dealing with a wide variety of threats, making it a versatile and adaptable control deck.

The deck focuses on utilizing a wide range of aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By including Jegantha as a companion, the deck gains an extra advantage. Key cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Wild Nacatl provide early pressure, while Leyline of the Guildpact and Tribal Flames offer versatile removal options. The deck also includes Stubborn Denial for protection and Leyline Binding for additional control. With a diverse mana base and strong synergy between its cards, this deck aims to close out games swiftly with its aggressive strategy.

This deck revolves around ramping up mana quickly using Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands like Selesnya Sanctuary and Simic Growth Chamber, allowing you to play your powerful spells ahead of schedule. The goal is to quickly find and play Primeval Titan to search for lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and The One Ring to deal massive damage to your opponent. The deck utilizes multiple combo pieces to accelerate your plays and overwhelm your opponent with huge threats like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove and Cultivator Colossus.

The deck focuses on assembling a diverse selection of creatures with varying abilities that can be used to create powerful combos. The creatures act as a toolbox, allowing the player to search for specific creatures needed in a given situation. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician serves as a key piece in facilitating these combos, along with cards like Blood Artist and Agatha's Soul Cauldron. Chord of Calling helps tutor for creatures, while Grist, the Hunger Tide can provide additional tokens for sacrifice or utility. The deck aims to create a versatile and synergistic board state to overwhelm the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly equipping Colossus Hammer onto creatures like Puresteel Paladin or Gingerbrute to deal massive amounts of damage early in the game. It also utilizes cards like Urza's Saga to search for key pieces and Sigarda's Aid to play equipment at instant speed. The goal is to create a powerful and fast combo that overwhelms the opponent before they have a chance to react, using cards like Forge Anew as a backup plan if the primary strategy is disrupted.

The key strategy of this deck is to consistently gain life through cards like Martyr of Sands and Abiding Grace, while controlling the board with removal spells like Solitude and Skyclave Apparition. The deck also utilizes cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos to search for key creatures and spells, while using Haywire Mite and Eagles of the North to apply pressure early in the game. The deck's win condition is to outlast opponents with a combination of lifegain and removal until it can overwhelm them with powerful creatures like The One Ring and Emeria, the Sky Ruin.

The main concept of this mono black control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Damnation. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Sheoldred's Edict and March of Wretched Sorrow, while also using Karn, the Great Creator to access powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Expedition Map. The end game plan involves casting Emrakul, the Promised End to seal the victory. The deck is built around resource denial and powerful finishers for a strong control strategy.

This deck aims to quickly swarm the opponent with low-cost, aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dauthi Voidwalker, while disrupting their strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Grief. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to seal the deal. The deck is also equipped with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push to deal with threats on the opponent's side of the battlefield. Additionally, the deck has a variety of lands to ensure consistent mana production and spell casting.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Murktide Regent to pressure the opponent. It also includes disruption spells like Counterspell and Lightning Bolt to control the game and protect its threats. The deck aims to win quickly by deploying threats early and using spells like Unholy Heat and Stern Scolding to remove opposing blockers or threats. It also includes card selection tools like Expressive Iteration and Preordain to ensure consistent draws and maintain pressure on the opponent.
